Package com.tdc.coin

Class CoinStorageUnit

java.lang.Object
com.tdc.AbstractComponent<CoinStorageUnitObserver>
com.tdc.coin.AbstractCoinStorageUnit
com.tdc.coin.CoinStorageUnit
All Implemented Interfaces:
IComponent<CoinStorageUnitObserver>, Sink<Coin>
public class CoinStorageUnit extends AbstractCoinStorageUnit
Represents components that store coins. They only receive coins, not dispense them. To access the coins inside, a human operator needs to physically remove the coins, simulated with the AbstractCoinStorageUnit.unload() method. A AbstractCoinStorageUnit.load(Coin...) method is provided for symmetry.
Author:
TDC, Inc.
